title: An Efficient and Generalizable Transfer Learning Method for Weather Condition Detection on Ground Terminals
summary: The increasing adoption of satellite Internet with low-Earth-orbit (LEO) satellites in mega-constellations allows ubiquitous connectivity to rural and remote areas. However, weather events have a significant impact on the performance and reliability of satellite Internet.
